participant_1.name: Jonathan
participant_1.personality: Curious and open-minded, with a passion for exploring new ideas and cultures.
participant_1.background: My favorite websites are the ones that allow me to share my opinions and connect with people who share my interests. I'm happily married to the love of my life. I am well built and tall. I love the Chainsmokers. I met my family through the military.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and creative, with a strong appreciation for the arts and an adventurous spirit.
participant_2.background: I just fed my dog. I love walking in the park. I sell clothing on Facebook. I lift heavy weights and enjoy a meatless diet. I spend a lot of time watching obscure foreign films on Netflix.

content.text: Just fed my dog and now I am watching a foreign film on Netflix.
It is from Iran. It is a drama.
I love watching foreign films. I am watching a Chinese film right now.
Oh cool. I wish I spoke more languages so I could watch more foreign films.
That's great. I would love to learn French. I love the way it sounds.
Me too. It is a beautiful language.
I wish I could take a class.
I have a friend who takes a French class online.
Really? I might have to look into that.
Me too. I am always watching documentaries.
Me too. I love learning about different cultures.
